When fused, the combined strength of Nichol, a Warden of the Waters, and the water god Leviathan brings forth billowing, roaring waves to crush all that stand before them. Even amidst the heat of battle, their attacks flow with an elegance evocative of a graceful dance.

When fused, the combined strength of Nichol, a Warden of the Waters, and the water god Leviathan brings forth billowing, roaring waves to crush all that stand before them. Even amidst the heat of battle, their attacks flow with an elegance evocative of a graceful dance.
401010001: Ang made his name known as a master of archery, a rare talent among a village of swordsmen. His arrows, shot with unparalleled accuracy, are said to pierce even the sun in their flight.
昂出生於劍士之村，卻在弓術上天賦異稟，並以其實力聞名世界。 傳聞其無比精準的一射甚至能命中太陽。
Ang made his name known as a master of archery, a rare talent among a village of swordsmen. His arrows, shot with unparalleled accuracy, are said to pierce even the sun in their flight.
401010101: Zyrus quickly incapacitates a dragon with a barrage of magic like a wrecking ball before unleashing one final spell, leaving not even a scale of the mighty beast remaining. The silent mage refuses to show any mercy to dragons, which he sees as nothing more than creatures of destruction.
扎拉斯以迅速且密集的魔法火力限制了龍的行動，每一擊都蘊含著巨大的破壞力，在龍釋放出最後一個法術之前就將牠消滅掉了，而這威武的巨大生物甚至連一片鱗片也沒有留下。這名寡言的魔道士對龍沒有任何慈悲之心，因為在他眼中，龍僅僅是只知道破壞和毀滅的可恨生物。

Zyrus quickly incapacitates a dragon with a barrage of magic like a wrecking ball before unleashing one final spell, leaving not even a scale of the mighty beast remaining. The silent mage refuses to show any mercy to dragons, which he sees as nothing more than creatures of destruction.
401010201: Ever gentle and kind to one and all, she conceals a determination stronger than even that of her brothers. As the Water Priestess, she communes with the Water God Leviathan in Olderion's times of need, and braves whatever trials that befall the aquapolis.
身為水之巫女，她總是非常穩重平和，且溫柔對待所有人，而深藏在心中的決心卻更勝她的兄弟們。當水都面臨危機之時，她與水神利維坦心意相通，挺身面對一切困難。

Ever gentle and kind to one and all, she conceals a determination stronger than even that of her brothers. As the Water Priestess, she communes with the Water God Leviathan in Olderion's times of need, and braves whatever trials that befall the aquapolis.
401010301: While his origins are not well known, there are few who are unaware of the deep animosity he holds for dragons and the immense magic he wields to destroy them. The sight of him as he left town, having felled a giant dragon, boasted enough majesty to make his presence known.
沒有多少人知道他從哪裡來，但人們都知道他打心底憎恨著龍，並且擁有能夠滅龍的強勁魔法之力。因為每當他消滅巨龍後，離去時那充滿威嚴的背影便足以宣揚他的存在。

While his origins are not well known, there are few who are unaware of the deep animosity he holds for dragons and the immense magic he wields to destroy them. The sight of him as he left town, having felled a giant dragon, boasted enough majesty to make his presence known.
401010401: Celeste relives the same nightmare every night, searching desperately among a city of flames for someone important to her. Whether that person be a friend, fellow officer, or loved one...only she knows.
瑟莉斯特每晚都做著相同的惡夢，在化為火海的城市裡絕望地找尋著某個對她來說很重要的人。而這個人究竟是她的好友、同僚還是摯愛呢…就只有她自己知道了。

Celeste relives the same nightmare every night, searching desperately among a city of flames for someone important to her. Whether that person be a friend, fellow officer, or loved one...only she knows.
401010501: The ultimate knight, formed from a fusion of Rain and Lasswell—two knights who are unfathomably strong in their own right, but the power the Knights of Grandshelt wield can hardly be measured by any number of people. However mighty his foe may be, his blade will cleave any evil asunder.
由雷因和拉斯韋爾——兩位有著巨大力量的騎士合體而成的究極的騎士。他有著深不可測的力量，不論多麼強大的邪惡都能被其手中的利劍一刀兩斷。

The ultimate knight, formed from a fusion of Rain and Lasswell—two knights who are unfathomably strong in their own right, but the power the Knights of Grandshelt wield can hardly be measured by any number of people. However mighty his foe may be, his blade will cleave any evil asunder.
401010601: A member of Caledfwlch, this master of dual blades seeks unparalleled strength. His breathtaking bladework is reminiscent of an unabating stream, driven with the force of an overwhelming deluge. It is easy to imagine that the apex of strength he so desperately seeks is soon to be within grasp.
諸王之刃的一員，以最強為目標的雙劍劍士。他的劍技宛如連綿不絕的流水一般美麗，又似奔湧的波濤一般強大。想必在不久的將來，他定能攀上強大的頂峰。

A member of Caledfwlch, this master of dual blades seeks unparalleled strength. His breathtaking bladework is reminiscent of an unabating stream, driven with the force of an overwhelming deluge. It is easy to imagine that the apex of strength he so desperately seeks is soon to be within grasp.
401010701: Steal from the rich and give to the poor—that is the rule Xon lives by. His daggers move with a swiftness one would never guess was honed on the streets. As for who taught him such polished techniques...only his beloved teddy bear Patches knows.
劫富濟貧的義賊——索恩。 他的雙劍技藝之精湛簡直讓人無法想像這是他在街頭磨練出來的。 而這一身技藝又是繼承自何人，這一答案恐怕只有一直陪伴著他的布偶熊才知道了。

Steal from the rich and give to the poor—that is the rule Xon lives by. His daggers move with a swiftness one would never guess was honed on the streets. As for who taught him such polished techniques...only his beloved teddy bear Patches knows.
401010801: The elder of a pair of demons born from chaos, Lucius's visage contorts with unbridled rage as he tears asunder those who provoke his contempt, though the truly perceptive may see a measure of euphoria beneath his anger. Should they witness his arrogance and brutality first-hand, even the mightiest of demons would kneel before him.
由混沌而生的惡魔兄妹中的哥哥路西亞斯。當他把看不順眼的對象大卸八塊時，他的表情看起來充滿憤怒……似乎也有些樂在其中的樣子。想必任何魔物都不得不屈服於他的傲慢和凶殘之下吧。

The elder of a pair of demons born from chaos, Lucius's visage contorts with unbridled rage as he tears asunder those who provoke his contempt, though the truly perceptive may see a measure of euphoria beneath his anger. Should they witness his arrogance and brutality first-hand, even the mightiest of demons would kneel before him.
401010901: With the formidable strength of his Regalia and the Miasma that emanates from it, Dioxus—the former Veritas of the Dark—has Rain and the others cornered. It is unclear what fate will befall them, as even the strongest warrior would be forced to his knees by the might of such power.
身為前代常暗之維利亞斯的迪歐賽斯，以被稱為戎裝的鎧甲之力的解放，以及釋放出的黑氣將雷因一行人逼入了絕境。在他壓倒性的力量面前，任何強者都會不由得五體投地吧。

With the formidable strength of his Regalia and the Miasma that emanates from it, Dioxus—the former Veritas of the Dark—has Rain and the others cornered. It is unclear what fate will befall them, as even the strongest warrior would be forced to his knees by the might of such power.
401011001: After receiving the strength of her fellow warriors, Elena is bestowed with the blessing of the Rainbow Crystal, becoming the leader of the Fundamental Forces. The curtain now rises over their final battle with the Dark Crystal...
艾琳娜接受了戰士們的力量，變身成為了身受虹光水晶加護的究極戰士——基本力量。  如今，她與漆黑水晶之間的最終決戰終於拉開帷幕――

After receiving the strength of her fellow warriors, Elena is bestowed with the blessing of the Rainbow Crystal, becoming the leader of the Fundamental Forces. The curtain now rises over their final battle with the Dark Crystal...
401011101: Eithne's dreams of peace vanish into the shadows after she is possessed by darkness. She stands before the Warriors of the Crystal with overwhelming strength powered by negative emotions.
艾芙尼祈願平靜的夢想，受到漆黑意志的侵襲而雲消霧散。被負面感情所囚禁的少女，以壓倒性的力量阻擋在了水晶戰士們的面前。
Eithne's dreams of peace vanish into the shadows after she is possessed by darkness. She stands before the Warriors of the Crystal with overwhelming strength powered by negative emotions.
401011201: Poppy lets her heart guide her brush, unconcerned with what others think of her art. However, it's the creativity and genuineness of her finished masterpiece that fills the hearts of those who view it with a curious warmth.
不去在意周遭的評價，隨心所欲揮動畫筆的珀妮。不可思議的是，她那純粹而又獨特的作品能夠溫暖所有觀者的心。

Poppy lets her heart guide her brush, unconcerned with what others think of her art. However, it's the creativity and genuineness of her finished masterpiece that fills the hearts of those who view it with a curious warmth.
401011301: One of the most influential members of the Orders, Hyoh once worked with a partner by his side. While said partner may have been a mere machine, there was still an undeniable bond between the two, and their strength combined allows Hyoh to attain the ultimate power.
號令者的實力幹將獵豹曾有一位搭檔。 雖然它僅僅只是一台機械，但他們之間也確實存在著能夠稱為羈絆的關係。 而當他們齊心合力之時，發揮出的力量則可到達究極的境地。

One of the most influential members of the Orders, Hyoh once worked with a partner by his side. While said partner may have been a mere machine, there was still an undeniable bond between the two, and their strength combined allows Hyoh to attain the ultimate power.
401011401: Wilhelm was a general of the Zoldaad Empire whose name resounded across the battlefield. One wouldn't imagine that his combat experience and large exterior housed such a kind soul, and he left behind the foundation of a new Zoldaad as his legacy.
佐爾達多帝國的維魯赫魯姆是一位在戰場上威名遠播的大將軍。而令人難以想像的是，有著如此輝煌戰鬥經歷和壯碩外表的他，據說其實是一位非常溫柔善良的人。而他的遺志，將會成為新生佐爾達多的基石。

Wilhelm was a general of the Zoldaad Empire whose name resounded across the battlefield. One wouldn't imagine that his combat experience and large exterior housed such a kind soul, and he left behind the foundation of a new Zoldaad as his legacy.
401011501: Although Elena, Warrior of the Azure Crystal, possesses strong qualities as a warrior, she never forgoes the opportunity to hone her skills. Having awoken a newfound power of the Crystal, she takes up her sword and shield as she continues her fight to protect the people against evil.
艾琳娜身為蒼藍水晶戰士，雖然身懷強大力量，但也絕不怠於鍛煉。覺醒了新的水晶之力的她，高舉著劍與盾，為斬除邪惡、守護人們而不斷戰鬥。

Although Elena, Warrior of the Azure Crystal, possesses strong qualities as a warrior, she never forgoes the opportunity to hone her skills. Having awoken a newfound power of the Crystal, she takes up her sword and shield as she continues her fight to protect the people against evil.
401011601: Malphasie, a mysterious woman who lives with a murder of crows, soars the sky in a gale of pitch-black wings and unleashes a fierce blast of wind.
與烏鴉一起生活的神秘少女瑪爾菲希，無數的黑色羽翼與少女一同飛舞在空中，捲起旋風釋放強力一擊。
Malphasie, a mysterious woman who lives with a murder of crows, soars the sky in a gale of pitch-black wings and unleashes a fierce blast of wind.
900020101: The long-awaited appearance of a metal cactuar. He flew onstage feeling a strong obligation to provide experience to vision cards but fled backstage and ran home after noticing the spotlight.
在絕佳的時機登場的金屬巨型仙人掌。他燃燒著給予幻兵卡經驗值的使命感而跳到了舞台之上，但因察覺到眾人的目光又逃回到了簾幕之後。
만반의 준비를 갖추고 등장한 메탈 사보텐더. 비전 카드에 경험치를 주겠다는 불타는 사명감을 안고 무대에 뛰어들었지만, 주목을 받게 되자 커튼 뒤로 줄행랑치고 말았다.

L'apparition tant attendue d'un pampinator. Il s'est précipité sur scène en sentant en lui le devoir de donner de l'expérience aux atouts-visions, mais il s'enfuit en coulisses et rentra chez lui sitôt qu'il aperçut les projecteurs.

Der langerwartete Auftritt des Metallkaktorius. Sein starkes Pflichtbewusstsein, Visionskarten Erfahrung verleihen zu müssen, ließ ihn förmlich auf die Bühne fliegen, aber als er sich binnen kurzer Zeit bewusst geworden war, dass er im Zentrum der Aufmerksamkeit stand, zog er ebenso schnell wieder von dannen.

La esperada entrada en escena de un cactilio de metal. Apareció al sentir la imperiosa necesidad de compartir su experiencia con las cartas de visión, pero se escondió entre bastidores y se marchó corriendo a casa abrumado al convertirse en el centro de todas las miradas.

Kemunculan kaktuar logam yang sudah ditunggu-tunggu. Ia menampakkan diri ketika merasakan kebutuhan mendesak untuk menyediakan pengalamannya kepada kartu vision, tapi kaktuar ini segera bersembunyi dan kembali ke rumahnya apabila ia menyadari dirinya menjadi pusat perhatian.
